titlestmt.titleproper: National City Bank of New York postcards 2000.007
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:17:21 +0000.

did.unittitle: National City Bank of New York postcards
did.abstract: Six photographic postcards showing the interior of the National City Bank of New York, printed in Brooklyn.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Beverly Wright Bastian, date unknown.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); National City Bank of New York postcards, 2000.007, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Minimally processed to the collection level.
